mapper.sql: a.g_id as gId, a.g_type1 as gType1, a.g_type2 as gType2, a.g_name as gName, a.g_ad as gAd, a.g_start_time as gStartTime, a.g_end_time as gEndTime, a.g_sale_city as gSaleCity, a.g_is_auc as gIsAuc, a.g_active as gActive, a.g_is_pack as gIsPack, a.g_loop_time as gLoopTime, a.g_deposit as gDeposit, a.g_start_num as gStartNum, a.g_price_up as gPriceUp, a.g_seller_id as gSellerId, a.g_seller_name as gSellerName, a.g_is_sale as gIsSale
mapper.select:
select
from tb_goods a where a.g_id = #{id}

select
from tb_goods a where 1=1
and a.g_name like "%"#{param.gName}"%"
and a.g_ad like "%"#{param.gAd}"%"
and a.g_is_auc = #{param.gIsAuc}

mapper.sql: b.file_id as fileId, b.ref_id as refId, b.file_name as fileName, b.file_group as fileGroup, b.seq as seq,
mapper.select:
select distinct * from (
select
from tb_goods a left join tb_file_info b on a.g_id=b.ref_id where b.seq = 1 and FIND_IN_SET(#{saleCity},a.g_sale_city) union all select
from tb_goods a left join tb_file_info b on a.g_id=b.ref_id where b.seq is null and FIND_IN_SET(#{saleCity},a.g_sale_city)
select
from tb_goods a left join tb_file_info b on a.g_id=b.ref_id where b.seq = 1 union all select
from tb_goods a left join tb_file_info b on a.g_id=b.ref_id where b.seq is null
) t where SYSDATE() between t.gStartTime and t.gEndTime and t.gIsSale='1' and t.gIsAuc = '0' order by t.gStartTime
mapper.sql: b.sku_id, b.sku_tob_price, b.sku_toc_price, b.sku_is_num, b.sku_goods_type, b.sku_repo_goods, b.sku_repo_goods_name, b.sku_num,
mapper.select:
select c.file_id, c.ref_id, c.file_name, c.file_group, c.seq,
a.g_id, a.g_type1, a.g_type2, a.g_name, a.g_ad, a.g_start_time, a.g_end_time, a.g_sale_city, a.g_is_auc, a.g_active, a.g_is_pack, a.g_loop_time, a.g_deposit, a.g_start_num, a.g_price_up, a.g_seller_id, a.g_seller_name, a.g_is_sale from tb_sku b left join tb_goods a on b.g_id=a.g_id left join tb_file_info c on c.ref_id = b.g_id where b.sku_goods_type in ('1', '2') and SYSDATE() BETWEEN a.g_start_time and a.g_end_time and c.seq = 1 and a.g_is_auc = '0'
and a.g_sale_city like "%,"#{gSaleCity}",%"
and SYSDATE() between a.g_start_time and a.g_end_time and a.g_is_sale = '1' order by a.g_start_time,a.g_id
mapper.insert:
insert into tb_goods( g_id, g_type1, g_type2, g_name, g_ad, g_start_time, g_end_time, g_sale_city, g_is_auc, g_active, g_is_pack, g_loop_time, g_deposit, g_start_num, g_price_up, g_seller_id, g_seller_name, g_is_sale ) values
( #{goods.gId}, #{goods.gType1}, #{goods.gType2}, #{goods.gName}, #{goods.gAd}, #{goods.gStartTime}, #{goods.gEndTime}, #{goods.gSaleCity}, #{goods.gIsAuc}, #{goods.gActive}, #{goods.gIsPack}, #{goods.gLoopTime}, #{goods.gDeposit}, #{goods.gStartNum}, #{goods.gPriceUp}, #{goods.gSellerId}, #{goods.gSellerName}, '1' )
mapper.update:
update tb_goods a set
a.g_name = #{gName}, a.g_ad = #{gAd}, a.g_start_time = #{gStartTime}, a.g_end_time = #{gEndTime}, a.g_sale_city = #{gSaleCity}, a.g_is_auc = #{gIsAuc}, a.g_active = #{gActive}, a.g_is_pack = #{gIsPack}, a.g_loop_time = #{gLoopTime}, a.g_deposit = #{gDeposit}, a.g_start_num = #{gStartNum}, a.g_price_up = #{gPriceUp}, a.g_is_sale = '1' where a.g_id = #{gId}
mapper.select: select c.g_id gId,c.g_type2 gType2,c.g_name gName from tb_goods c where c.g_is_sale = '1' and c.g_is_auc!=1 and SYSDATE() > c.g_start_time and SYSDATE() > c.g_end_time

select g.g_id gId,g.g_type2 gType2,g.g_name gName ,g.g_is_auc,s.sku_id,m.num_resource,m.status, m.start_time,m.end_time,s.sku_goods_type,m.id num_id from tb_num m left join tb_sku s on m.sku_id = s.sku_id left join tb_goods g on s.g_id = g.g_id and SYSDATE() > g.g_start_time and SYSDATE() > g.g_end_time where m.status=2 and m.num_resource = #{num} and s.sku_id = #{skuid}
mapper.update: update tb_num m set m.status=1,m.sku_id=null,m.start_time=null,m.end_time =null where m.id=#{num_id} and m.sku_id=#{skuid} and m.num_resource=#{num}
